llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Great! Based on the information provided, here's a 7-day travel plan for your group of 4 from Lexington to Texas:

Day 1 (March 18th): Flight from Lexington to Dallas

* Depart Lexington Blue Grass Airport (LXN) at 05:53 AM and arrive at Dallas Love Field Airport (DAL) at 07:27 AM
* Check into your hotel in Dallas, such as the Homewood Suites by Hilton Dallas Downtown (approximately $100 per night) or the La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Dallas Central Expressway (approximately $80 per night)
* Spend the rest of the day exploring Dallas, such as visiting the Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Garden, the Perot Museum of Nature and Science, or the Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza

Day 2 (March 19th): Drive from Dallas to San Angelo

* Depart Dallas at approximately 8:32 AM and drive to San Angelo via I-20 W (approximately 1,408 km, 12 hours 55 minutes)
* Check into your hotel in San Angelo, such as the Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott San Angelo (approximately $80 per night) or the La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham San Angelo (approximately $70 per night)
* Spend the rest of the day exploring San Angelo, such as visiting the San Angelo State Park, the Old Town Historic District, or the Concho Valley Railroad Museum

Day 3 (March 20th): Flight from Dallas to San Angelo

* Depart Dallas at approximately 8:32 AM and arrive at San Angelo at 9:32 AM (flight duration: 1 hour)

Day 4 (March 21st): Drive from San Angelo to Houston

* Depart San Angelo at approximately 12:39 PM and drive to Houston via I-10 W (approximately 415 km, 3 hours 55 minutes)
* Check into your hotel in Houston, such as the Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston Downtown (approximately $100 per night) or the La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Houston Northwest (approximately $70 per night)
* Spend the rest of the day exploring Houston, such as visiting the Space Center Houston, the Houston Museum District, or the Buffalo Bayou Park

Day 5 (March 22nd): Flight from San Angelo to Houston

* Depart San Angelo at approximately 12:39 PM and arrive in Houston at 1:30 PM (flight duration: 1 hour)

Day 6 (March 23rd): Drive from Houston to Lexington

* Depart Houston at approximately 8:46 AM and drive to Lexington via I-10 W (approximately 586 km, 5 hours 46 minutes)
* Check into your hotel in Lexington, such as the Homewood Suites by Hilton Lexington (approximately $80 per night) or the La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Lexington (approximately $70 per night)
* Spend the rest of the day exploring Lexington, such as visiting the Kentucky Horse Park, the Lexington History Museum, or the University of Kentucky Art Museum

Day 7 (March 24th): Departure from Lexington

* Check out of your hotel in Lexington and depart for the Blue Grass Airport (LXN) at approximately 10:00 AM

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $6,800 (2 flights from Dallas to San Angelo and Houston to Lexington)
* Accommodations: $9,000 (3 nights in Dallas at $3,000 per night, 3 nights in San Angelo at $2,400 per night, 3 nights in Houston at $2,100 per night, and 1 night in Lexington at $800 per night)
* Transportation: $1,600 (gas for driving from Dallas to San Angelo, San Angelo to Houston, and Houston to Lexington)
* Food and Activities: $2,500 (food and drinks during the trip, as well as entrance fees for attractions and activities)

Total Budget: $16,800

Note: The budget breakdown is an estimate and may vary depending on individual preferences and circumstances.

I hope this helps you plan your trip from Lexington to Texas! Let me know if you have any further questions or requests.
